problem.markdown: What is the main reason the apmlification effect does NOT work as an attack anymore? ( ) They still work perfectly. ( ) There are very few bandwidth limits. (x) Computers have stopped responding to pings on networks. ( ) Pings can only be sent by specific IP addresses.
problem.p: What is the main reason the apmlification effect does NOT work as an attack anymore?

choicegroup.choice: There are very few bandwidth limits.
Computers have stopped responding to pings on networks.
Pings can only be sent by specific IP addresses.
